title: It's a Wonderful Life
oscars_won_details: Technical Achievement Award (for the development of a new method of simulating falling snow)
description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

title: The Best Years of Our Lives
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have changed.

title: Notorious
description: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

title: The Big Sleep
description: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.

title: Gilda
description: A sinister boss and his right-hand man get into a power struggle when the boss's beautiful and mysterious new wife arrives.

title: Great Expectations
description: A humble orphan suddenly becomes a gentleman with the help of an unknown benefactor.

title: A Matter of Life and Death
description: A British wartime aviator who cheats death must argue for his life before a celestial court.

title: My Darling Clementine
description: Wyatt Earp and his brothers arrive in Tombstone and become involved in a feud with the Clanton family.

title: Beauty and the Beast
description: A beautiful young woman takes her father's place as the prisoner of a mysterious beast, who wishes to marry her.

title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
description: A drifter enters the life of a unhappy wife and they plot to kill her husband.

title: The Killers
description: Hit men kill an unresisting victim, and an insurance investigator uncovers the man's past, which involves a femme fatale and a heist.

title: The Yearling
description: A boy persuades his parents to allow him to adopt a young deer, but the animal's destruction of the family's crops creates serious problems.

title: Duel in the Sun
description: A half-Native American girl becomes the center of a bitter rivalry between two brothers in Texas.

title: The Razor's Edge
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: An adventurous young man goes off to find himself and loses his fiancée to a more conventional man.

title: The Stranger
description: An investigator from the War Crimes Commission travels to Connecticut to find an infamous Nazi.

title: Paisan
description: Six vignettes follow the Allied invasion of Italy from Sicily to the northern marshes.

title: Shoeshine
description: Two friends try to earn enough money to buy a horse, but they get involved in the black market.

title: The Spiral Staircase
description: A serial killer targets women with disabilities, and a mute servant girl in a gothic mansion may be next.

title: Humoresque
description: A talented violinist rises from humble beginnings but his personal life suffers as he becomes involved with a wealthy patroness.

title: The Jolson Story
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: The life story of singer Al Jolson, starring Larry Parks with songs dubbed by Jolson himself.

title: Anna and the King of Siam
description: An English widow travels to Siam to become governess to the children of the King, and finds herself clashing with his traditions.

title: The Blue Dahlia
description: An ex-bomber pilot suspected of murdering his unfaithful wife hunts down the real killer with the help of a sympathetic stranger.

title: The Harvey Girls
description: A group of waitresses travels west to open a Harvey House restaurant, facing opposition from the local saloon owner.

title: Cluny Brown
description: A plumber's niece with a penchant for plumbing and a Czech refugee writer meet in England just before WWII and shake up high society.

title: Dragonwyck
description: A simple country girl marries a wealthy distant cousin, but discovers dark secrets in his Hudson River estate.

title: A Night in Casablanca
description: The Marx Brothers wreak havoc in a post-war Casablanca hotel where Nazis are trying to reclaim stolen treasure.

title: Green for Danger
description: During WWII, a British rural hospital becomes the setting for murder on the operating table, investigated by the eccentric Inspector Cockrill.

title: Bedlam
description: In 18th-century London, the sadistic asylum master commits a sane woman to the asylum to silence her criticism.

title: Three Strangers
description: Three strangers share a sweepstakes ticket and a strange idol, but greed and fate intervene.

title: The Dark Mirror
description: A doctor falls in love with one of two identical twin sisters, one of whom is a murderer.

title: The Locket
description: A woman's past comes back to haunt her on her wedding day, revealing a history of kleptomania and deceit.

title: The Strange Love of Martha Ivers
description: Three childhood friends are bound together by a terrible secret, which resurfaces when one of them returns to town.

title: Canyon Passage
description: A merchant in 1856 Oregon balances business, romance, and Indian uprisings.

title: A Stolen Life
description: A twin sister takes her deceased sister's place to win the man they both loved.

title: Road to Utopia
description: Two con men find a map to a gold mine in Alaska and steal it.

title: Deception
description: A pianist tries to hide her past relationship with a famous composer from her new husband, a cellist.

title: Ziegfeld Follies
description: The late Florenz Ziegfeld looks down from heaven and stages a new revue with MGMs top talent.

title: Till the Clouds Roll By
description: A musical biography of composer Jerome Kern, featuring many of his famous songs.

title: Two Sisters from Boston
description: A proper Bostonian girl shocks her family by singing in a New York saloon.

title: Blue Skies
description: A dancer and a singer compete for the love of a showgirl over many years.

title: Monsieur Beaucaire
description: A barber in the court of Louis XV is forced to impersonate a nobleman to escape punishment.

title: The Kid from Brooklyn
description: A timid milkman accidentally knocks out a boxing champion and becomes a prizefighter.

title: The Diary of a Chambermaid
description: A newly hired chambermaid in 19th-century France gets involved in the intrigues of the wealthy Lanlaire family.

title: The Verdict
description: A Scotland Yard superintendent is forced to resign after an innocent man is hanged, but he tries to clear his name.

title: Tomorrow Is Forever
description: A man presumed dead in World War I returns home 20 years later to find his wife remarried.

title: Sister Kenny
description: The story of Sister Elizabeth Kenny, an Australian nurse who fought to gain recognition for her treatment for polio.

title: Somewhere in the Night
description: An amnesiac war veteran tries to discover his identity and gets mixed up with criminals.

title: Black Angel
description: A woman tries to clear her husband of a murder charge by finding the real killer with the help of the victim's alcoholic husband.

title: The Chase
description: A drifting veteran becomes the chauffeur for a Miami gangster and falls for his wife, leading to a desperate flight.

title: Undercurrent
description: A woman begins to suspect that her new husband may have murdered his missing brother.
